text:
尊敬的客户，您已于2024年10月16日在线上渠道成功办理“100元档”活动。
1. 活动时间：2024年10月16日09:55:07-2024年11月1日00:00:00。
2. 活动内容：
（1）活动期间约定开通的业务：
业务1：动感地带5G智享套餐（校园版）59元，标准资费59元/月。 活动结束后继续保留。
如您的业务参加了其他资费优惠，具体收费以实际账单为准。
trans:
Dear valued customer, you successfully enrolled in the “100 Yuan Package” activity through online channels on October 16, 2024.
1. Activity Period: from 09:55:07 on October 16, 2024, to 00:00:00 on November 1, 2024.
2. Activity Details:
(1) Subscribed Service During the Activity Period:
Service 1: M-Zone 5G Smart Sharing Plan (Campus Edition) at 59 yuan, with a standard monthly fee of 59 yuan. This service will remain active after the activity ends.
If your service is part of another discount plan, the specific charges will follow the actual bill.
